entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
